item.title: GPCA Opposes Recall - Endorses Dan Kapelovitz
item.description:
The Green Party of California OPPOSES the Gubernatorial Recall Election and endorses Green Party candidate Kapelovitz for Governor, after delegates from active county Green Parties participated in a vote following a six-week discussion period.
Q1: VOTE NO ON RECALL
Q2: VOTE FOR DAN KAPELOVITZ
item.dc:creator: nassim

item.title: Green Party of California Statement on 5G Wireless Technology Environmental Oversight
item.description: February 1st, 2021 - The Green Party of California advocates for local control, environmental review and public consent that present policy supporting 4G/5G technology takes away.
item.dc:creator: nassim

item.title: International Day of Peace - Shaping Peace Together In Solidarity
item.description: September 21 - Monday, September 21st marks both the 39th anniversary of the United Nations International Day of Peace and the 19th anniversary of the vote to pass the post-9/11 Authorization for Use of Military Force, or AUMF. On a day dedicated to “education and public awareness on issues related to peace,” the United States Congress and the President agreed to make war the perpetual state of the country and, therefore, the world.
item.dc:creator: nassim

item.title: GPCA ASL Statement of Purpose
item.description: The GPCA Statement of Purpose in American Sign Language - May 6, 2020
item.dc:creator: Nicole Raglin

item.title: The Green Party of California condemns US hostile military actions
item.description: The Green Party of California condemns the hostile military action by the United States’ administration in recently assassinating military leaders of Iran and Iraq. Such acts violating international law, as well as other provocations and threats against sovereign nations, will lead to more endless wars and devastation in the Middle East...
item.dc:creator: nassim

item.title: General Assembly Dec 2019 in Fresno County
item.description: You are invited to the Green Party of California General Assembly December 7-8, 2019 in Fresno County. Register Today.

item.title: Green Party of California Stands with Workers on Labor Day
item.description: September 2nd, 2019 - Green Party of California Stands with Workers on Labor Day. Labor Day is not a holiday, but a battle in history that continues to be waged today.

item.title: General Assembly May 18 & 19, 2019
item.description: The Green Party of California invites all Greens to join us at our next General Assembly, held on May 18 & 19, 2019, at the Redstone Building, 2490 16th St., San Francisco

item.title: An 'Emergency Green New Deal for the Central Valley' Event on Nov. 17
item.description: Join Dr. Jill Stein and California Greens at An Emergency Green New Deal for the Central Valley event, at the Green Party of California biannual, state General Assembly on November 17-18 in Porterville, CA
item.dc:creator: nassim

item.title: Ten of the thirty two California Green candidates are elected to office on Nov. 6th.
item.description:
nov6.jpg

Wednesday, November 7, 2018

Ten of the thirty two California Green candidates are elected to office after the November 6th elections! Eight of those ten elected, were incumbents. The Green Party of California thanks all these courageous candidates and congratulates California's newly elected Greens.
item.dc:creator: nassim
